name: Public Defense Corp
detailed_description:
When she was young, Haruka's hometown was destroyed by an evil group called Jakou.

The trauma of that event made her swear that she'd get vengeance for what they did to her home.

Now an adult, Haruka has been selected as a pilot of a bipedal robot for the company, Public Defense Corp, giving her an opportunity to get her revenge.

Features:

  • Giant Robot RPG
  • Run missions in a sci-fi world
  • Modify your robot from dropped parts
  • Do PR to increase your popularity

short_description: Years after her hometown was destroyed by an evil group, Haruka joins the company, Public Defense Corp. Now, armed with a bipedal robot, Haruka can work towards getting her revenge for what happened to her home.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
